text.title: Square on Second Bimedial Straight Line applied to Rational Straight Line
text.summary: This proof demonstrates that if AB is a second bimedial line divided at C into its medials, and DE is a rational line where DEFG = AB² is applied to DE such that DG is its breadth, then DG is a third binomial straight line.
